li.data-alt: The staff of Patlan Elementary School compiled photos to share a message of love and support for their students and families. #TeamSeguin

li.data-alt: In honor of Earth Day on April 22, Seguin ISD kindergarten students were asked to create an image using materials from Earth to spell the words Earth or Earth Day as an enrichment activity this week.

p.span: In honor of Earth Day on April 22, Seguin ISD kindergarten students were asked to create an image using materials from Earth to spell the words Earth or Earth Day as an enrichment activity this week.

li.data-alt: Last week, we made a social media plea for masks for our Child Nutrition employees who have been tirelessly serving student meals for several weeks. A big Matador thank you to Lora Mullings, right, with Campus Adventures for generously donating 100 hospital-grade masks to our Child Nutrition team. #TeamSeguin

p.span: Last week, we made a social media plea for masks for our Child Nutrition employees who have been tirelessly serving student meals for several weeks. A big Matador thank you to Lora Mullings, right, with Campus Adventures for generously donating 100 hospital-grade masks to our Child Nutrition team. #TeamSeguin

li.data-alt: For the second straight year, Seguin ISD's dedication to music education has resulted in the Best Communities for Music Education Award by the NAMM Foundation. Seguin is a fine arts town, and your support makes this 2020 award possible! #TeamSeguin

li.data-alt: Construction continues on the Matador Stadium project as seen in this recent drone photo. What's that inscripted in the turf on the 20 yard lines? Jack Taylor Field, of course. #TeamSeguin
